alert.note: Alert for Carver; Hennepin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 5:22PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hennepin and east central Carver Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 522 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chaska, or 20 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Chanhassen around 530 PM CDT. Mound, Minnetrista and Excelsior around 535 PM CDT. Eden Prairie, Orono and Wayzata around 540 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Plymouth, Minnetonka, St. Louis Park, Golden Valley and Hopkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
